summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6183 for the improvement of East 135th Street from 35th Avenue Northeast to approximately 215 feet east of 40th Avenue Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87188, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
